info.title: Apollo14 Air Quality API
info.description: API for air quality monitoring and photo submissions

get.summary: Get current air quality for a location
get.description: Retrieves current air quality data including AQI, NO2, O3, and PM2.5 levels for the specified coordinates

message.example: Failed to fetch air quality data

get.description: Retrieves 7-day air quality forecast data for the specified coordinates
Retrieves historical air quality data for the specified coordinates and time period

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to retrieve (1-30, default: 7)

get.summary: Get air quality alerts for a location
get.description: Retrieves air quality alerts and warnings for the specified coordinates

message.example: Air quality is unhealthy for sensitive groups

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password
Authenticate user with email and password

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Subscribe to push notifications with device endpoint and keys

get.description: Retrieve user's notification settings and active subscriptions
Retrieves paginated list of user's photo submissions

post.summary: Submit a photo with air quality guess
post.description: Submit a photo with user's guess of air quality level and location coordinates

photo.description: Photo file (JPEG, PNG, JPG, GIF, max 10MB)

user_guess.description: User's guess of air quality level (1-5)

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific submission
